text: “While we may be in similar situations, albeit for different reasons, I believe the emotional struggles are the same. I can relate to what it feels like to suddenly lose your job and to to have your world suddenly stop.” - Kevin Spacey on people losing their jobs due to COVID-19 https://t.co/2gqGokvOgw
